oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of doping in BaNi2V2O8, a two-dimensional honeycomb antiferromagnet
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NATH, R
DAS, J
MAHAJAN, AV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: antiferromagnetism
barium compounds
magnetic susceptibility
temperature
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report the temperature dependence of susceptibility Ï‡(T) of the two-dimensional (2D) honeycomb antiferromagnetic (AF) Ba(Ni1-xCux)2V2O8 for image and 0.1. The undoped BaNi2V2O8 is known to exhibit long-range-order (LRO) below image with image. We find that doping Cu (S=1/2) at Ni (S=1) site results in a magnetic dilution effect which suppresses the three-dimensional (3D) ordering temperature (TN). Our results are compared with those of nonmagnetic Mg-doped BaNi2V2O8.
